tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I took my 1.5 years old son who developed a high fever on sunday morning and he is one the very few doctors available on sunday. He is very polite and spends time to completely understand the patient's medical background and administers medicine accordingly. His dosages are not very high but mild *** ********** In 2 days, my son became normal and i would definitely recommend him to others. Morevoer, he himself called and enquired upon the health of the child after 3 days. It's good to see this kind of doctors.

tags: None
review: Based on reviews on Practo, I had met Dr.Sreedhar for my 2.6 yrs old son who gets frequent colds and has very disturbed sleep at night.I was very happy i made this decision. Dr.Sreedhar is so patient, spends time to listen to the complaints first, asks complete history of the child and thinks about various remedies , discussed with us and the best thing is his follow ups daily about the health condition of my son. He is not hasty in giving medicines and takes one step at a time. Going to visit him again this week and I have full confidence that my son will be allright soon with his guidance :) He is very helpful and we can call him for doubts in medicines and follow ups and he will answer our queries which is great for mothers like me who are worrying about child health !! I would surely and completely recommend him !!

tags: None
review: My Daughter baby Ashritha is suffering with a Stiff Leg and based on my friends recommendation and feedback's in practo, i took my baby to him. He was a real professional and god fearing physician.  He took almost more than an hour to examine my babies symptoms and he was very patient in listening and advised me very clearly to make further course of action.  I have no words to say and all came to my mind is : GOD SENT ME TO THE RIGHT PLACE AND MY BABY WILL OK VERY SOON BY GODS GRACE AND GODS HEALING POWER AND Dr. Sreedhar TREATMENT. Thank You Doctor. Thank you for taking time to see & examine my daughter. You are a blessing :) Lokeshwaran

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is very Friendly and has patience to listen to each of the issues we talk thru about Kid.He also notices Kid's action and tries to interact with them as well.Most of the Other Doctors visited till date have no time to listen to kid's issues and are in hurry to fill up the prescriptions and make us move out of consulting room.** ******** ********* *** **** *** ** *** ** ******* ****** *** ** ** *****He follows up with Parents and provides Guidance based on Health condition of Kid.The charges are reasonable and he is also available even on Sundays.
I strongly recommend Dr Sreedhar for his Godliness Touch upon kids.He is blessed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited him multiple times this time for my son cold and fever. He patiently listened to all the observations and asked his questions for better understanding of the problem. He noted all the observations in a structured format for records which defines prowess. He would not suggest medicine unless until it is must for critical. He followed recovery staus with us regularly.  We need doctors like him in many department, rather filling prescription with medicine and supporting for side effects. Thank you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi to all parents ..

Myself Bindhya anoop from chennai and i would like to share my experience with u all... Friends i would nt explain u how fabulous is Dr. Sreedhar in his work.. For us doctor is like a family member we could be able to speak openly all in detail about my son nd he listens carefully .. Note it down nd explain us all in depth.. He too shares experiences of our kids so that we can recognize well.. Never ever i and mh husband met such a nice ,caring, understanding doctor... We see a different personality in him... Nd more over he dont suggest us much medicines.. I have seen many doctors they dump on kids huge tablets without even seeing age bt here doctor suggest us homeo medicines only.. Its excellent.. I am giving my kid homeo for all sorts of illness nd its working superb in 1 day.. I c miracle in this... Doctor is too friendly that we r able to call anytime in need nd he will respond back nd guide us... So my humble request to all parents is too kindly follow doctor wht he says nd do accordingly.. Thanks nd love to all ... 😊

tags: None
review: My daughter had fever, back pain and body ache. With lot of dengue cases around, I was a bit scared. Since it was only two days, he left it to me on taking blood test. Though the blood sample did not show any signs of dengue. So, he suggested he can either give homeopathic or allopathic medicine. His preference was homeopathic on this instance. He gave some medicines and asked us to call him twice a day to update him the progress. Not sure how many doctors do this without charging for phone consultation. He followed it up till my daughter got well. We have to wait for long as he spends a lot of time with each patient. Though, it is for our betterment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very gentle, experienced *** **** ********** Very patient in hearing our concerns and Most importantly only doctor around who is available on Sunday also, when it comes to our kids health we cant wait for Monday. Happy we could find this doctor. Will recommend to everyone!

review: I come from navallur for check up and vaccination..Doctor Sreedhar is worth the distance..i was not satisfied with my previous Pediatrician..but Dr.Sreedhar is a GEM at handling my SON..he explains every doubt we have very patiently..he answers for our doubts at anytime..i would 200% say to trust him n suggest him as well.. thank you doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
He's a patient friendly doctor. Takes ample time to check his patients and gives good medicines. 

The only concern is with the appointment system, the lady in the reception hardly stay at her seat and keeps a track of the patients who come in.
They don't maintain any records of the patients who come in... When we ask her she was very rude and started using abusive languages with us. 
This could be corrected and Organized in a better way to avoid any chaos.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We took our kid for the first time keep vaccine. Now we are taking our kid regularly to him since we are very much satisfied by the way he takes care of our kid. Doctor used to be very friendly to baby. He is available over phone for simple queries and first level of support,which is very helpful for us. 
He used to play along with kid so that they feel comfortable with doctor.
He studies kid behavior very well. He will not give unnecessary medicines to heal very quickly. Overall, I recommend you to consult him.

tags: None
review: This cold and cough started for my younger daughter 3 years old since 28 July 2016. Knocked almost all doors of multi speciality hospitals. Followed all medications suggested by doctors team. my daughter, my elder son 8 years old and myself 32 years had heavy cough, cold and vomiting due to coughing till 15 August 2016. We called doctor Sreedhar on 15 08 2016 at 9 pm. Visited hospital at 9.15. doctor took sufficient time to take the history of disease till 11.30 pm. With in a day my son recovered, my daughter s health also improved. Thanks a lot for Dr. Sreedhar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a wonderful doctor who explains clearly about the infection or treatment for the illness. He is more of natural way of healing the illness rather medicines. Very transparent and friendly who never hesitates to respond to our queries. More than that, he daily followed up and instructed us on kids health status and provided medicines accordingly.. He has become out favorite doctor. Would highly recommend to those who give antibiotics  to their children he clearly explains the pros and cons of it.

tags: None
review: He takes time to listen and to try out various options as to what would work on your child. We started seeing relief in a while and by the next day morning, the kid was completely alright. I have called him on his mobile a couple of times about my child's health and here's a doctor who goes out of his way and take out time to answer your queries and make your child feel better. I did not face the mind numbing experience of having to wait for 2-3 hours at the clinic for the doctor. I took my child, met the doctor and came back - as simple as that - which is what you want when you have a child crying of pain. You don't want to worry about packing a whole meal and 3 diapers for your waiting time at the doctor's clinic. I am so glad this is so close by to where we live. Such a boon!

tags: None

He did not prescribe any unnecessary medication. He asked us to give him a call incase if we have any queries later. Very parent friendly doctor.

tags: Wait time,
review: Waiting time is so long. We were waiting for more than 45 mint. Please asign lot as per availability. There is no point standing nd waiting. Not liked the service.
reply_text: Hi. My aim is to keep the wait time as low as possible. Most of the patients I do see on time but sometimes delay happens due to various reasons. Eg this time I had to see an emergency  case which needed more time as he came with severe breathing difficulty . So obviously all the subsequent appointments got delayed. For this reason while booking appointment it is very clearly mentioned that there may be a waiting time  upto 60 min.Also during the pandemic we cannot allow patients to crowd in the waiting room. So best is to wait in an open area outside clinic and come in when called  ...I totally understand that its uncomfortable especially with kids but it goes a long way to prevent  transmission of corona ...Thank you for your feedback...

review: Went there by mistake. Will not go again. The doctor comes late and does not exhibit professional behaviour.
reply_text: Hi ...it's not my intention to make patients waiting... l get late to the clinic if there is an emergency , for example,  to see a child with emergency in another hospital...And I inform patients I will be late so that they are free to go elsewhere should the child have any emergency or they don't want to wait for any reason...Also I don't quite understand why you wrote  I   did not exhibit professional behaviour...pls be specific...I am open to take constructive  feedback .

review: Booking an appointment by practo is not advised  as doctor don't give priority for appointments booked by practo, patients should go directly for an appointment.
reply_text: Hi... I do give preference to practo appointments but if emergencies are  there then  the appointments get delayed...also some cases need extra time as they are complicated...also many patients walk-in and they don't understand that the other patients have already booked appointments...my aim is to  cut down the waiting to less than half an hour ...I encourage you to book through practo...
